meaningMnemonic: I am going to <kanji>descend</kanji> my <kanji>participat</kanji>ion in this conflict. I am going to descend all my weapons to the ground. I am going to <vocabulary>surrender</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
